processed.result:
You are given an array of $n$ numbers.  You can add any positive integer less than or equal to $10^9$ to the array at any position.  The goal is to find the minimum number of additions needed to make the array co-prime.  An array is co-prime if no two adjacent numbers share any common divisors other than 1.

Output the minimum number of additions and the resulting co-prime array.

You are given a list of numbers. You can add any number less than or equal to 10^9 to the list. The goal is to make the list so that no two adjacent numbers share any common divisors other than 1.  Output the minimum number of additions needed and the resulting list.
